DataElement.preferredName: Refractory Disease Recurrent Disease Progressive Disease Patient Second-Line Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment._The return of a disease after a period of remission._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The second preferred therapy for a particular condition, used after first-line treatment fails or if a person cannot tolerate first-line drugs._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Refractory Disease Recurrent Disease Progressive Disease Patient Second-Line Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment._The return of a disease after a period of remission._A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The second preferred therapy for a particular condition, used after first-line treatment fails or if a person cannot tolerate first-line drugs._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Refractory Disease Recurrent Disease Progressive Disease Patient
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.:A disease process that is increasing in scope or severity.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Second-Line Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The second preferred therapy for a particular condition, used after first-line treatment fails or if a person cannot tolerate first-line drugs.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The second preferred therapy for a particular condition, used after first-line treatment fails or if a person cannot tolerate first-line drugs.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
